name: Chex®icago Party Mix
author: Chex
summary: Whip up a batch of Chex® Mix reminiscent of the windy city's flavor combo of sweet and salty.
ingredients: ⅓ cup light brown sugar or molasses
directions: Mix cereals, 1 cup of the cheese crackers and 2 cups of the popcorn in large, microwavable bowl
Place butter, brown sugar, corn syrup and salt in 2-cup microwavable measuring cup
Stir; microwave on High until bubbling
Remove from microwave; stir in baking soda
Mixture will foam up, but keep mixing until baking soda is dissolved
Pour over the cereal mixture; stir until fully coated
Microwave on High 4 to 5 minutes, stirring after every minute
Spread on waxed paper-lined baking sheet
Let cool for about 5 minutes to let caramel fully harden
Stir in remaining 1 cup cheese crackers and 1 cup popcorn
